item.title: Angry Monkeys - A Corporate Fable
item.description: This is my favorite corporate fable. Its moral is simple, but it is very easy to walk right into it. *A group of scientists put five monkeys in a room, and in the middle they placed a stepladder that had a delicious banana on its platform. When a monkey climbed the ladder and got to the banana the scientists hosed down the remaining 4 monkeys. After a while the poor animals understood that they were going to get drenched if one of them attempted to get to the banana, so they lunged at the monkey that fell into temptation and beat it until it changed its mind.
